name: Aqua America, Inc.
description: Aqua America, Inc. is a leading water and wastewater utility company based in the United States, committed to providing high-quality, reliable water and wastewater services to its customers. Founded in 1886, Aqua America serves over three million people across eight states, including Pennsylvania, Ohio, North Carolina, Illinois, Texas, New Jersey, Indiana, and Virginia. The company focuses on sustainable water management, with a mission to ensure the availability of clean water for future generations. Aqua America invests significantly in its infrastructure to improve service reliability and environmental stewardship. The company is dedicated to meeting regulatory standards and is recognized for its efforts in water conservation and environmental sustainability. Aqua America is also actively involved in community outreach and education on water-related issues. Through innovation and technology, Aqua America aims to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience while maintaining its commitment to sustainability.
